channel.title: Home on Ed's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Ed's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: I’m currently an MSc. student at Imperial College London – this is my personal website, which is where I put things that I find interesting when I get the time to write about them. Mostly these are explanations of things that I found tricky to begin with and wished for an explanation written by myself in the future once I did understand them! I’m interested in maths (at the moment mostly statistics/probability and computational methods around them), music and rowing.
